lead_paragraph: The British singer, songwriter and comedian combines twinkle with toughness in her show of personal stories and songs at 59E59 Theater.

headline.print_headline: Telling Tales With Grit and Twinkle
headline.main: Review: In One-Woman Show, Dillie Keane Is Silly With a Purpose

snippet: The British singer, songwriter and comedian combines twinkle with toughness in her show of personal stories and songs at 59E59 Theater.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews one-woman show Hello, Dillie!, by British singer-songwriter Dillie Keane accompanied by pianist Michael Roulston, at 59E59 Theaters.
